an4.103:1.8: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, cattaro kumbhupama puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
an4.103:2.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo tuccho hoti pihito?
an4.103:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa pasadikam hoti abhikkantam patikkantam alokitam vilokitam saminjitam pasaritam sanghatipattacivaradharanam.
an4.103:2.3: So ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam nappajanati …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam nappajanati.
an4.103:2.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo tuccho hoti pihito.
an4.103:2.5: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, kumbho tuccho pihito;
an4.103:3.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo puro hoti vivato?
an4.103:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa na pasadikam hoti abhikkantam patikkantam alokitam vilokitam saminjitam pasaritam sanghatipattacivaradharanam.
an4.103:3.3: So ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajanati …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajanati.
an4.103:3.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo puro hoti vivato.
an4.103:3.5: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, kumbho puro vivato;
an4.103:4.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo tuccho hoti vivato?
an4.103:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa na pasadikam hoti abhikkantam patikkantam alokitam vilokitam saminjitam pasaritam sanghatipattacivaradharanam.
an4.103:4.3: So ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam nappajanati …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam nappajanati.
an4.103:4.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo tuccho hoti vivato.
an4.103:4.5: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, kumbho tuccho vivato;
an4.103:5.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo puro hoti pihito?
an4.103:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa pasadikam hoti abhikkantam patikkantam alokitam vilokitam saminjitam pasaritam sanghatipattacivaradharanam.
an4.103:5.3: So ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajanati …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajanati.
an4.103:5.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo puro hoti pihito.
an4.103:5.5: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, kumbho puro pihito;
an4.103:5.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro kumbhupama puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmin”ti.
